awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Whilst making a silent film about the life of the legendary lawman Wyatt Earp, veteran actor 'Tom Mix' (Bruce Willis) discovers that the real Earp ('James Garner') is on the film set as a technical advisor. The two become friends, but when a murder takes place, the two become partners and set about tracking down the killer.
plot: Tom Mix and Wyatt Earp team up to solve a murder at the Academy Awards in 1929 Hollywood.
title: Sunset
